column1: After competing across the country in 36 states and territories (and counting!) Hillary Clinton has built a nearly insurmountable lead when it comes to both delegates and popular votes

Shes also the only candidate—Democrat or Republican—who has received more votes than Republican frontrunner Donald Trump. n There are   why Hillary should be the Democratic nominee and our next president
But the numbers alone make one thing clear: She is the only candidate who is ready to take on the Republicans in November
